metadata.title: USN-6944-1 -- curl vulnerability
metadata.description: Dov Murik discovered that curl incorrectly handled parsing ASN.1 Generalized Time fields. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause curl to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive memory contents.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6944-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  curl - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 libcurl3-gnutls - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 libcurl3-nss - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 libcurl4 - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 libcurl4-doc - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 libcurl4-gnutls-dev - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 libcurl4-nss-dev - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 libcurl4-openssl-dev - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.23 No subscription required
